XXnagcitiu:627: nīlaṃ kṛṣṇaṃ ca dīrghaṃ ca NCit_3.129c
XXnagcitiu:677: parvaṃ dīrghaṃ ca vṛtaṃ ca NCit_3.82a
XXnagcitiu:782: bramha priyau hi rājan tvaṃ NCit_1.23a
XXnagcitiu:897: mukhe śmaśru na roma ca NCit_3.116b
XXnagcitiu:943: ye bhavanti ca teṣāṃ vai NCit_3.3a
XXnagcitiu:1213: sukhaṃ vā yadi vā duḥkhaṃ NCit_1.32a
XXnagcitiu:1241: strīṇāṃ bhāgaḥ sa eva hi NCit_3.99d
